name: Flickr Lighter Color Theme
description: Hate the new Flickr on black?  Try this lighter white and gray color scheme that harkens back to vintage Flickr when times were brighter and the days were filled with joy!
additional_info:
v1 (3.29.2014) Gray photo pane, white description and comment pane with black text.

Note: Some of these styles will rewrite colors in my "Flickr Comment Focus" theme, which featured a gray description pane.
